main event: A witness reported seeing an unusual round, white light in the sky over Dalton, New York on April 7, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as round and white, approximately 15-20 feet long, The witness observed the object traveling at a high rate of speed without making any sound, The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes before the object disappeared, The witness was approximately 25-30 years old, The object was seen in bright daylight conditions.
witness description: a young man, approximately 25-30 years of age
